Sentencas: 2MgO-Al2O3-3.3P(2)O(5) glasses with increasing amounts of SiO2 are considered for sealing applications in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: The influence of SiO2 addition to 2MgO-Al2O3-3.3P2O5 glass

Sentencas: The change in chemical durability under SOFC anode conditions and the linear thermal expansion are measured as functions of the SiO2 concentration.
Titulo: The influence of SiO2 addition to 2MgO-Al2O3-3.3P2O5 glass

Sentencas: Raman spectroscopy analysis of the glasses reveals no sign of important changes in the glass structure upon SiO2 addition.
Titulo: The influence of SiO2 addition to 2MgO-Al2O3-3.3P2O5 glass

Sentencas: Some increase in glass durability with SiO2 concentration is reported and its cause discussed.
Titulo: The influence of SiO2 addition to 2MgO-Al2O3-3.3P2O5 glass
